data.name: Evelyn's Adventure Demo
data.supported_languages:
English, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 17 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: The sexual content that you can find in the demo is the possibility that, during the gameplay, you lower the camera, you can see the panties of the older girls. Also, after having sex with the maid, the change of clothes shows Evelyn naked with her back to the player.
